payload: make sure that litellm endpoint can be used for the gemini model tasks, base url and api key are correct but i get api error, check logs on you own

tests: 42/42 pass, lint: pass (pre-existing warnings), build: pass. Fixed LiteLLM integration by adding GEMINI_API_KEY and GEMINI_API_BASE_URL env vars to both api and workers services in docker-compose.yml. Root cause: env vars were defined in .env but not forwarded to Docker containers. The @google/genai SDK was defaulting to Google real API which rejected the LiteLLM virtual key with 404.

LiteLLM integration fix verified. Two changes: (1) docker-compose.yml now passes GEMINI_API_BASE_URL to workers and both GEMINI env vars to API service, (2) model name updated to gemini/gemini-3-flash-preview (LiteLLM provider/model convention) in all 3 files.
